title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: MBA Operations Management Capstone Project: Real-World Learning-Based Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic operational management theory, process analysis techniques, and data-driven decision-making methods
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Systematically develop process improvement plans by diagnosing operational issues in real-world businesses.
Collaborate with industry partners to collect and analyze data, then write practical reports.
Demonstrate leadership and communication skills in team-based projects to complete deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
